            <string language="en">levers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hebel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">leviers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">alavancas</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">μοχλοί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">palancas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Egyoldalú és kétoldalú emelő</string>
            <string language="en"> one-sided and double-sided levers</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">egyszerű gépek,  emelők,  egyoldalú emelő,  kétoldalú emelő,  </string>
            <string language="en"> simple devices, levers,  one-sided and double-sided levers</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de"> einseitige und doppelseitige Hebel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr"> leviers recto et double face</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt"> alavancas simples e frente e verso</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it"> leve su un solo lato ed a doppia faccia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el"> μονόπλευροι και double-sided μοχλοί</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es"> palancas unilaterales y de doble cara</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de"> einfache der Hebel, einseitiger und doppelseitiger Hebel 
der Einheiten,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr"> leviers simples de dispositifs, de leviers, recto et 
double face</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt"> alavancas simples dos dispositivos, das alavancas, as 
simples e as frente e verso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it"> leve su un solo lato ed a doppia faccia semplici dei 
dispositivi, delle leve,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

μοχλοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es"> palancas simples de los dispositivos, de las palancas, 
unilaterales y de doble cara</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
